plot: Charley becomes manager of a restaurant owned by his girlfriend's father, and attempts to update it with a number of unusual devices.
title: He Done His Best
plot_es: Charley becomes manager of a restaurant owned by his girlfriend's father, and attempts to update it with a number of unusual devices.
plot_en: Charley becomes manager of a restaurant owned by his girlfriend's father, and attempts to update it with a number of unusual devices.
